I am [guessing because I don't know Japanese] that the 2 women in
this painting are part of the women's
brigade...http://1happyturtle.com/SHQ/aizuwomensbrigade.jpg
please correct me if I'm wrong...go ahead publicly humiliate me ^_^

messages.subject: Aizu Women's brigade names
messages.msgSnippet: For everyone s reference-- the names of the Aizu women s brigade that I know of...from http://g1342122.at.infoseek.co.jp/ Commander-- Nakano Takeko Members--
messages.messageBody:
For everyone's reference-- the names of the Aizu women's brigade that
I know of...from http://g1342122.at.infoseek.co.jp/

Commander-- Nakano Takeko

Members--

Nakano Kouko
Nakano Yuuko
Hirata Kochou
Hirata Yoshi
Yamamoto (Niishima) Yaeko
Yorita (Mizushima) Kikuko


I'll post more as I find them.

--M.
